data.title: TVLine Items: Demi Lovato Holiday Special, LEGO Jurassic Park Trailer and More

data.text:
Demi Lovato is bringing the Xmas spirit to Roku.

A Very Demi Holiday Special, in which the singer performs Christmas classics and a few of her own original hits, will debut Friday, Dec. 8 on The Roku Channel.

Lovato will croon staples like “Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas,” “Rockin’ Around the Christmas Tree” and “Jingle Bell Rock,” in addition to partaking in “a very special surprise duet.” The program will also feature TBA celebrity guests.

Ready for some more recent newsy nuggets? Well…

* The six-part limited series Expats — directed by Lulu Wang (The Farewell) and starring Nicole Kidman (Big Little Lies), Brian Tee (Chicago Med), Sarayu Blue (Never Have I Ever), Ji-young Yoo (The Sky Is Everywhere) and Jack Huston (Fargo) — will premiere Friday, January 26, 2024 on Prime Video.

* Prime Video has set a Friday, Nov. 17 premiere date for Twin Love, its “social dating experiment” that explores the love lives of 10 sets of identical twins. The series is hosted by Brie and Nikki Garcia (formerly known as the Bella Twins). Watch a teaser here.

* Peacock has released a trailer for LEGO Jurassic Park: The Unofficial Retelling — a comedic retelling of the original 1993 blockbuster, told through the lens of Dr. Ian Malcolm — which premieres Tuesday, Oct. 10:

* Netflix has released a trailer for the comedy series Neon, executive-produced by Daddy Yankee and premiering Thursday, Oct. 19:
